title: 2) DMC Shalamar megamix (from their 1st tape, Feb 1983).mp3
description:
I had a good response to my first mix yesterday - 15 people seeding & 2GB uploaded from me alone in the first 24 hours.
So here is another one:

This classic megamix is the first artist mix from DMC. It comes from side 2 of the first monthly release, which was on cassette, and sent out to the handful of DJ&#039;s who had joined Tony Prince&#039;s brand new DJ only mixes service in February 1983.

Track listing:

There It Is
A Night To Remember 
I Can Make You Feel Good 
I Owe You One 
Attention To My Baby
Second Time Around 
Make That Move 
Playing To Win
Friends

Duration: 12 mins.

These two mixes are the only ones on the cassette. The remainder of side 2 contains previews. These were new and complete singles which DMC thought would do well in the charts, and which members were encouraged to play & promote.
There was also a second tape & this contained previews only.
